entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
Trump says he "learned about the gravity" of COVID-19 in late January. He's either lying (the WH was briefed repeatedly on it, starting in November) or he's incompetent. Or both.

Even if he found out the gravity then, why are we just now ordering supplies, three months later? https://t.co/TNp0LO9Cor
